chunks.text:
# Extendicare

## Resident Sling and Belt Wash Guidelines### ARJOHUNTLEIGH

1. Loop Style Slings: machine wash in mild soap at maximum temperature 80 °C; do not use bleach. For thermal decontamination, wash at minimum 71°C for at least 3 minutes.

2. Clip Style Slings: machine wash in mild soap at a maximum temperature of 80°C. For chemical decontamination: sodium hypochlorite 150-300 p.p.m. in low temperature wash. For thermal decontamination, wash at minimum 71°C for at least 3 minutes.
chunks.section_title: Loop Style Slings: machine wash in mild soap at maximum temperature 80 °C; do not use bleach. For thermal decontamination, wash at minimum 71°C for at least 3 minutes.

chunks.text:
3. Do not iron, do not tumble dry.

4. Air dry only; hang to dry.### WAVERLEY GLEN
chunks.section_title: Do not iron, do not tumble dry.

chunks.text:
1. Machine wash in mild soap to temperature shown on label. Maximum wash temperature 80°C.

2. Do not use bleach.
chunks.section_title: Machine wash in mild soap to temperature shown on label. Maximum wash temperature 80°C.

chunks.text:
3. Do not dry clean.

4. Do not iron.

5. Air dry; hang to dry.### HOYER

1. Machine wash in mild soap at maximum 71°C.
chunks.section_title: Air dry; hang to dry.### HOYER

chunks.text:
2. Do not iron, do not tumble dry.

3. Air dry only; hang to dry.### VERSA LIFT SLINGS
chunks.section_title: Do not iron, do not tumble dry.

chunks.text:
1. Remove stiffeners.

2. Machine wash in mild soap in warm or cold water.

3. Do not use bleach.

4. Air dry only; hang to dry.### MECANAIDS GP SLINGS (AMBULIFT)

1. Follow manufacturer care instructions.### MEDI MAN SLINGS

1. Follow manufacturer care instructions.### HANDICARE SLINGS
chunks.section_title: Follow manufacturer care instructions.### MEDI MAN SLINGS
